sentence.Network_en: He wore a hidden microphone to secretly tape-record conversations.
sentence.Network_cn: 他身上藏了一个传声器，打算偷偷录下谈话内容。

sentence.Network_en: His wife Marie secretly entered him for the Championship.
sentence.Network_cn: 他妻子玛丽偷偷地为他报名参加锦标赛。

sentence.Network_en: She was secretly vetted before she ever undertook any work for me.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在为我工作以前曾受到过秘密考查。

I secretly vowed : be sure to listen carefully and strive to complete the work , to learn well .我暗暗发誓：一定要认真听讲，努力完成作业，好好学习。

entry.def: If something is secret, it is known about by only a small number of people, and is not told or shown to anyone else.

example.ex: Soldiers have been training at a secret location...
example.tran: 士兵们一直在一个秘密场所训练。

example.ex: The police have been trying to keep the documents secret.
example.tran: 警方一直设法将这些文件保密。

entry.def: A secret is a fact that is known by only a small number of people, and is not told to anyone else.

example.ex: I think he enjoyed keeping our love a secret...
example.tran: 我觉得他喜欢和我偷偷摸摸地谈恋爱。

example.ex: I didn't want anyone to know about it, it was my secret.
example.tran: 我不想任何人知道这件事，这是我的秘密。

entry.def: If you say that a particular way of doing things is the secret of achieving something, you mean that it is the best or only way to achieve it.

example.ex: The secret of success is honesty and fair dealing...
example.tran: 成功的秘诀在于诚实和公平交易。

example.ex: I learned something about writing. The secret is to say less than you need.
example.tran: 我学过一点写作方面的技巧，秘诀就是欲说还休。

entry.def: Something's secrets are the things about it which have never been fully explained.

example.ex: We have an opportunity now to really unlock the secrets of the universe...
example.tran: 我们现在有机会去真正解开宇宙的奥秘。

example.ex: The past is riddled with deep dark secrets.
example.tran: 过去承载了诸多不可告人的惊天秘密。

entry.def: If you do something in secret, you do it without anyone else knowing.

example.ex: Dan found out that I had been meeting my ex-boyfriend in secret.
example.tran: 丹发现我一直在跟前男友偷偷见面。

entry.def: If you say that someone can keep a secret, you mean that they can be trusted not to tell other people a secret that you have told them.

example.ex: Tom was utterly indiscreet, and could never keep a secret.
example.tran: 汤姆言语很不谨慎，什么时候也别想他守住秘密。

entry.def: If you make no secret of something, you tell others about it openly and clearly.

example.ex: His wife made no secret of her hatred for the formal occasions...
example.tran: 他的妻子公开表示厌恶那些礼节性的场合。

example.ex: Ministers are making no secret about their wish to buy American weapons.
example.tran: 部长们毫不隐瞒他们想要购买美国武器的愿望。

sentences.sentence: "met secretly to discuss the invasion plans"
"the children secretly went to the movies when they were supposed to be at the library"
"they were secretly delighted at his embarrassment"
"hoped secretly she would change her mind"

auth_sentence.content: Does this mean they secretly want to be raped?
auth_sentence.res_content: Does this mean they secretly want to be raped?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Does this mean they secretly want to be raped?

auth_sentence.content: I am secretly hoping Ubuntu will defect to KDE.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am secretly hoping Ubuntu will defect to KDE.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am secretly hoping Ubuntu will defect to KDE.

auth_sentence.content: The subjects were secretly divided into two large groups.
auth_sentence.res_content: The subjects were secretly divided into two large groups.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The subjects were secretly divided into two large groups.

sentences.en: Friends managed to smuggle him secretly out of the country.
sentences.cn: 朋友们想方设法将他秘密送出国了。
他暗地里瞧不起自己的父亲。

sentences.en: He secretly hoped that fate would intervene and save him having to meet her.
sentences.cn: 他暗自希望命运帮他一把，别让他碰见她。

sentences.en: He watched them secretly,through a chink in the wall.
sentences.cn: 他透过墙缝暗中监视他们。

sentences.en: Her parents didn’t allow her to marry the young man and she went off with him secretly.
sentences.cn: 她父母不允许她与那个年轻人结婚,她便悄悄地和他私奔了。
